mapper.select: SELECT qu.question_key questionKey , qu.question_title questionTitle , qu.question_content questionContent , qc.question_category questionCategory , th.theater_name theaterName , th.theater_region theaterRegion , qa.question_answer questionAnswer , qa.createdate createdate FROM question qu INNER JOIN question_category qc ON qu.question_category_key = qc.question_category_key INNER JOIN theater th ON qu.theater_key = th.theater_key LEFT OUTER JOIN question_answer qa ON qu.question_key = qa.question_key WHERE qu.customer_id = #{customerId} AND qu.question_key = #{questionKey}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM question WHERE customer_id = #{customerId}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(order BY q.question_key DESC) num , q.question_key questionKey , q.question_title questionTitle , q.createdate createdate , qa.question_answer questionAnswer FROM question q LEFT OUTER JOIN question_answer qa ON q.question_key = qa.question_key WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT question_category_key questionCategoryKey, question_category questionCategory FROM question_category
